thread.title: Zayn Malik channels James Dean in edgy shearling jacket
thread.title_full: Zayn Malik channels James Dean in edgy shearling jacket | Daily Mail Online

author: Jason Chester for MailOnline
title: Zayn Malik channels James Dean in edgy shearling jacket
text:
He’s redefined his career with a highly contemporary new sound, but Zayn Malik channelled the past on Thursday evening at the Billboard Power 100 celebration in West Hollywood.
The former One Direction star, 24, opted for an edgy look reminiscent of ‘50’s icon James Dean ahead of his appearance at Italian restaurant Cecconi’s, where the year’s most influential music executives were being honoured at a pre-Grammy’s gala.
Opting for a shearling lined denim jacket and skinny black jeans, Zayn looked typically stylish as he posed for photos and signed autographs for waiting fans outside the upmarket venue.
Scroll down for video
Old school: He’s redefined his career with a highly contemporary new sound, but Zayn Malik channelled the past on Thursday evening at the Billboard Power 100 celebration in West Hollywood
The British star added to his look with scuffed hobnail boots, while a casual blue T-shirt – visible between the lapels of his open jacket – rounded things off.
In keeping with his vintage look, Zayn who was without model girlfriend Gigi Hadid on the night, styled his hair with a classic quiff.
With his new goat head chest tattoo partially visible, the singer commanded attention as he made his way inside.
Looking good: Opting for a shearling lined denim jacket and skinny black jeans, Zayn looked typically stylish as he posed for photos and signed autographs for waiting fans outside the upmarket venue
Layer up like Zayn in a shearling jacket by Coach Coach 1941 Fall 2017 menswear
Shop the current collection here...
Buy now
His girlfriend might be queen of the catwalk, but Zayn Malik gave Gigi Hadid a run for her money when he attended the Billboard Power 100 celebration!
We love the rock n roll vibe he's been going for recently. This time his too cool for school jacket is by Coach, and Zayn is clearly a big fan of the brand since we spotted him wearing their cute dinosaur print sweater earlier this week.
We love the dark wash denim, cosy shearling collar and distinctive leather trim pocket details on this jacket. It hails from the AW17 menswear runway (an embellished version is pictured, right), so it's not yet available to buy, but click through to shop the current collection.
Or snuggle up in one of the shearling options we've got lined up for you in the edit below. Asos, Topman and Levi's have got some very dapper jackets!

That looks familiar: The former One Direction star, 24, opted for an edgy look reminiscent of ‘50’s icon James Dean ahead of his appearance at Italian restaurant Cecconi’s, where the year’s most influential music executives were being honoured at a pre-Grammy’s gala
Well inked: Zayn showed off his intricate hand tattoos as he [prepared to make his entrance on Thursday evening
This year's event saw event saw Spotify founder and CEO Daniel Ek winning top spot following a hugely sucessful year for the music streaming service.
Universal Music Group chairman Lucian Grainge and Live Nation chief Michael Rapino respectively landed the number two and three positions while Eddy Cue of Apple, Jimmy Iovine and Robert Kondrk shared number four.
Columbia Records chairman and soon to be Sony Music CEO Rob Stringer rounded off the top five.
Here he comes: The British singer was surrounded as he made his way into the West Hollywood restaurant
Finishing touches: The British star added to his look with scuffed hobnail boots, while a casual blue T-shirt – visible between the lapels of his open jacket – rounded things off
Fresh ink: With his new goat head chest tattoo partially visible, the singer commanded attention as he made his way inside
Zayn's outing comes shortly after the official video for his musical collaboration with Taylor Swift.
The song, I Don't Wanna Live Forever, has been written especially for Fifty Shades Darker - and its promotional video is tense and racy affair.
Released in December, I Don't Wanna Live Forever was co-written by Swift alongside Lena Dunham's boyfriend Jack Antonoff and LoveHate Thing scribe Sam Dew.
